stocktrader

Class Order

  • java.lang.Object
    • stocktrader.Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Order
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Order class is meant used by the portfolio class to add and remove values and prices associated with creating a new order such as min price, max price, and quantity to purchase.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Order(float min, float max, float quant, StockQuote orderStock, boolean buy)
      A pending order for a stock with an associated quantity and price range values.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Buy()
      This method returns the results of the setBuy method, determining if the order is a buy order or not.
      float getMaxPrice()
      This method determines the maximum price for the order.
      float getMinPrice()
      This method returns the minimum price to be paid for the order.
      float getQuantity()
      This method determines the quantity of stock for the current order.
      StockQuote getStockQuote()
      This method gets a stock quote from StockQuote.
      void setBuy()
      This method determines if the current order is slated to be bought.
      void setMaxPrice(float max)
      This method sets the maximum price to be used in getMaxPrice.
      void setMinPrice(float min)
      This gets the minimum price to be used in getMinPrice.
      void setQuantity(float quantity)
      This method gets the quantity to be used in getQuantity.
      void setStockQuote(StockQuote newStock)
      This sets the current stock quote for the order.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Order

        public Order(float min,
             float max,
             float quant,
             StockQuote orderStock,
             boolean buy)
        A pending order for a stock with an associated quantity and price range values.
        Parameters:
        min - Min price.
        max - Max price.
        quant - Quantity to order.
        orderStock - Which stock to order.
        buy - Whether this is a buy or sell order.

        This method gets a stock quote from StockQuote.

        This sets the current stock quote for the order.
        Parameters:
        stock - The new version of this Order's associated StockQuote.

        This method determines if the current order is slated to be bought.

      • getQuantity

        public float getQuantity()
        This method determines the quantity of stock for the current order.
        Returns:

      • Buy

        public boolean Buy()
        This method returns the results of the setBuy method, determining if the order is a buy order or not.
        Returns:
        Returns true if this is a buy order.
